title: Login Implementation with Cypress
description: Automating login functionality is crucial for streamlining testing processes, improving test coverage, ensuring accuracy and reliability, enabling faster feedback loops, optimizing resource utilization, facilitating scalability, and supporting parallel testing efforts. By automating login tests, organizations can enhance the quality, efficiency, and agility of their software development lifecycle.

title: Cypress Actions
description: Implementing GitHub Actions in a Cypress.io project empowers development teams to automate testing processes, improve code quality, and accelerate the delivery of high-quality software.

title: Multiple reporters HTML Cypress
description: Mochawesome Reporter: This is a third-party reporter that generates HTML reports with rich formatting. It provides detailed test results including test names, durations, commands, and screenshots. It's popular for its visually appealing and informative reports.

title: Mongo DB and Postman automation API
description: This project shows how you can install MongoDB. Create a basic API using mongoDB locally and how you can automate those scenarios using Postman

title: JavaScript and Google Sheet
description: The project shows the way to connect to Google sheet and manipulate information to create a page using information cells

title: Extended HTML Report in Selenium
description: This repository shows how you can implement HTML report in Selenium, besides how the application attaches images, and the end how you can run those test cases using Jenkins
